ruleset.name: Performance
ruleset.description: The Performance ruleset contains a collection of good practices which should be followed.

rule.name: AvoidSoqlInLoops
rule.description: New objects created within loops should be checked to see if they can created outside them and reused.

rule.name: AvoidDmlStatementsInLoops
rule.description: Avoid DML statements inside loops to avoid hitting the DML governor limit. Instead, try to batch up the data into a list and invoke your DML once on that list of data outside the loop.
